congVote.result: So the motion to recommit was rejected.

congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Scholarships for Opportunity and Results Reauthorization Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 4901, to reauthorize the Scholarships for Opportunity and Results Act, by a recorded vote of 224 ayes to 181 noes, Roll No. 179.
